title: What should be used in the place of 'either” and “or' when it comes to three or more possibilities? - Quora

response.answer_text: In formal situations, you cannot use either …. or…. when there are more than two choices or alternatives. However, the usage either x or y or z is becoming very popular nowadays. I will suggest that you use either…. or…. informally only; since, the nitpickers will make a hue and cry otherwise.  An Approach to ICSE English
If the possibilities are three or more, only or is used.
